> <OLD>
>
> With a growl and fright response, Nightshift's fur goes a complete fluff.
> He raises his back, snarls, ears go flat back on his head as he exposes
> pearly white teeth.   He does not let onto his true identity and continues
> to act like a true panther.  He roars and crouches, and takes a few swipes
> at his oncoming   restraints.   This fuss is followed by a feline hiss as
> whiskers lift upward as the cat continues his protest.

<NEW>

Two gates have crahsed down, one on both ides of the tunnel that
NIGHTSHIFT was traveling down. At the sound the voices at the end of
the hall stopped, then there is a clear command, "Go check it out."

"Sir." Came a quick response.

Two of the humans . . . and yes humans as from their stance and the
hairlessness that peeks out from under their robes they cannot be
proto-humans . . . approached looking cautiously through the gate.

Thgey looked much like the humans that were in the village but these
are of course dressed in robes, hoods are pulled up to cover their
facial features but their arms can be seen, and they have no hair and
they have fully dextrous fingers.

What appears to be a wristwatch is on the arm of one. it glints in the
small amount of light filtering into this tunnel from up ahead.

> <OLD>
>
> Windlord and Perceptor took their weapons out. They moved quickly to help
> their friend

<NEW>

WINDLORD and PERCEPTOR reach the area of NIGHTSHIFT and see him
trapped inside, between two gates. On the other side of the gates -
the FAR side of the gates the humans have just arrived as well.

One of the humans nodded to the other and then pulled out what could
only be defined as a rifle, although it looked far more high tech then
a simple rifle.

a WATCH a RIFLE?????  these are far more high tech then anything
proto-humans have ever used so far. As far as anyone knew proto-humans
are still learning to use simple levels and pulleys,

A WATCH or a RIFLE would be . . . SHOULD BE . . . far beyond them.

With a simple of a trigger he fires something that looks like a dart
at NIGHTSHIFT, and since he is in the tunnel there is little room to
dodge!!

(TAG)

- Preston
